feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 6:54 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
